Use of information provided in form RF-1175 by other public agencies In order to coordinate and simplify reporting by business and industry, information provided in this form can be used in whole or in part by other public agencies authorised to collect the same information, cf. the Act relating to the Register of Reporting Obligations of Enterprises sections 5 and 6. Information about any such coordination can be obtained from the Register of Reporting Obligations of Enterprises by calling +47 75 00 75 00, or from the Directorate of Taxes by calling 800 800 00.
